CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1946, pg. 26, reads: "Circus Girl - Theresa Weaver is one of the forty girls who will swim and perform in 'Water Circus' at Ammon pool on the night of Aug. 9. Theresa is one of the district's top woman swimmers, and has been rehearsing for the past three weeks with a great cast for the 'show of shows.' - Harris Photo."Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1946, read: "participants in the colorful Water Circus at Ammon Center pool Friday, Aug. 9.  The Circus will be one of the feature events of Frogs Week Celebration.  The spectacular show will include all types of stunts, ballet dancing and thrilling diving.  The Bureau of Recreation is joining with the Frogs in sponsoring the Circus which promises to be as sensational as anything of its kind ever presented here."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Theresa Weaver wearing one piece bathing suit with floral front and dark back, and braided hairstyle, posed on diving board of Ammon recreation center swimming pool
